title: King Crimson 2015-12-16 Tokyo Japan Orchard Hall 16 44 FLAC8
description:
King Crimson
Orchard Hall
Tokyo, Japan
December 16, 2015

DPA4061 > battery box > PCM M10 (96/24)
PCM M10 > USB > PC > Adobe Audition 3 (amplify, tracking) > wav > TLH > flac > PC via torrent > selected tracks > TLH > wav > Wavelab 5.01b (tracking) > wav > TLH >flac > Foobar2000 (SoX resampler to 24/44.1, 95.2% passband 25% phase response no aliasing) > iZotope RX Advanced 2 (mBit+ dither to 16/44.1, ultra noise shaping high dither) > TLH > flac8 > Foobar2000 (tagging)

16 bit 44.1 khz version

01. announcement
02. opening SE
03. Larks' Tongues In Aspic Part I
04. Peace - An End
05. Pictures of a City
06. Radical Action (To Unseat the Hold of Monkey Mind) I
07. Meltdown
08. Radical Action (To Unseat the Hold of Monkey Mind) II
09. Red
10. Epitaph
11. Hell Hounds of Krim
12. The ConstruKction of Light
13. A Scarcity of Miracles (Jakszyk, Fripp and Collins cover)
14. Banshee Legs Bell Hassle
15. Easy Money
16. Interlude
17. The Letters
18. Level Five
19. Starless
(encore)
20. Larks' Tongues In Aspic Part II
21. 21st Century Schizoid Man

Robert Fripp (e.gt)
Mel Collins (sax, fl)
Tony Levin (eb)
Pat Mastelotto (drs)
Gavin Harrison (drs)
Bill Rieflin (drs, key)
Jakko Jakszyk (vo, e.gt)
